A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved this movie and in the direction it went. Especially the dynamics and the obvious blossoming romance brewing between Kylo Ren and Rey. Luke's role in this film was wonderful\, including the late and fabulous Carrie Fisher. What a way this film went. John Boyega\, Kelly Marie Tran Tran\, Laura Dern\, and Oscar Isaac were the light of the film and made it worth while for me to watch it again!
